title: Riot, We Challenge You!

embed.description: Report TSM Newtronix (Watch till very end) First time editing :) pls put any tips below Corki - PromotedSkeleton (Jack) Leona - Watchtower101 (Tajwar) Katarina - TSM Newtronix (Luka) Malphite - ChickenGamin (Tom) Gragas - Ultraepicmoose (Owen)

body:
Hi, my name is TSM NewTronix, TSM fanboi, mid-laner and owner of our casual team, TeamScuttleGromp.
Our group play for fun but we often beat high plat-diamond players in ranked 5's.
I am here to challenge Riot to create a group of daring Rioters to 5v5 us.
If your up for the challenge, send me a friend request in game and we can work something out.
(Sorry if this is the wrong place to post this, I couldn't find anywhere else).
Later Nerds.
P.S. I linked a video of our ranked team, made by Watchtower101.

replies.body: add me and we will try sort something out!
